narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Epic Health Services, Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Pharr, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $62.7M in Medicaid payments across 159K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $62.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
